production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
production.post-deploy: npm install ; npm link /srv/website/current/sites/elab ; grunt compile --sites=engagement-lab-home ; pm2 restart 'server' --env production

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
